abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column evaluates apps that aid those interested in learning martial arts.
lead_paragraph: These apps offer video, photos and written instructions to train aspiring martial artists.

headline.main: ‘Karate’ Means Empty Hand, but a Handheld Device Is Needed
headline.print_headline: ‘Karate’ Means Empty Hand, but a Handheld Device Is Needed

snippet: These apps offer video, photos and written instructions to train aspiring martial artists.
